task_descriptions: You want to reserve a room at the @Name-1 from May @StartDate-1 to @EndDate-1. Your name is @CustomerName-1. Please do not make a custom request, and it is ok if no room is available - just say goodbye in this case.
Make a reservation at @Name-1 from May @StartDate-1 to @EndDate-1. Your name is @CustomerName-1. Please request @Request-1. It is ok if the room is not available - just say goodbye in this case.
completion_questions: Did the assistant reserve your hotel?
Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Help the user reserve a hotel room.
